name: Asparagus With Roasted Red Pepper Salsa
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: appetizer, side dish, asparagus, chili, cilantro leaves, garlic, lime juice, red bell pepper, red onion, low-carb, low-sodium, vegetarian, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch cilantro to yield 3/4 cup chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and trim asparagus by breaking off stem at tough part. Steam asparagus for 3 to 7 minutes, depending on stalk thickness.

Rinse and julienne the red peppers. Wash, seed and mince the hot peppers. Mince the garlic, and chop onion. Wash, dry and chop cilantro. Combine all these ingredients, and then add 2 teaspoons lime juice. Stir well.
When asparagus is cooked, drain and mix with red pepper salsa.
